---
bibliography: publications/refs.bib
csl: publications/sx-style.csl
knitr:
  opts_chunk:
    echo: false
    message: false
    results: 'asis'
    warning: false
link-citations: false
notice: |
  @*
suppress-bibliography: true
---

```{r}
source("publications/utility.R")
mybib <- read_bibtex("publications/refs.bib")
mykey <- names(mybib)
myyear <- sub(".*?([0-9]{4}).*", "\\1", mykey)
myorder <- order(myyear, mykey, decreasing = TRUE)
mybib <- mybib[myorder]
for (k in names(mybib)) {
  entry <- mybib[[k]]
  cat("## ", entry$title, "\n\n", sep = "")
  cat(
":::: {.columns}
::: {.column width=\"40%\"}
![](publications/", k, ".png){style=\"max-width:95%;\"}
:::

::: {.column width=\"60%\"}
Published in *", entry$journal, "*, ", entry$year, ".\n\n",
paste(readLines(sprintf("publications/%s.md", k)), collapse = " "), "\n\n",
"Recommended citation: @", k, "
:::
::::

", sep = "")
  print_entry(k)
  cat("\n")
}
```
